name: Toobler Prototype
description:
In this game, run through a series of procedurally-generated mazes and get to the hatch at the end while avoiding cannonballs that can go through walls.

Adjust the rate of fire and size of the maze to create your own custom scenario.

Build up consecutive runs to rack up a high score.

This game is a work-in-progress prototype, so any feedback or comments would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you for playing!
